short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Organize the tools you use for every task.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Chrome extension to organize your tools for every task. Don't spend your energy trying to remember how you like to do something.

Instant Workspace Setup
- Click on one of your groups and a new window will be opened with all the group's tabs.

Auto-saving Sessions
- If you open any extra tabs after opening a task group, they'll be saved to a 'session' and will still be there next time you open that group.

Nested Task Groups
- Opening a group will also open all of its sub-groups, so you can make hierarchies of task specificity.
